snippet: Technological advances are helping refine tools for hearing in less-than-ideal circumstances.
abstract: Anne Eisenberg Novelties column features technological advances that are helping refine tools for people who are hard of hearing in less-than-ideal circumstances, especially when there is a lot of ambient noise; notes in-ear earphones and an iPhone app that amplifies and processes sound.
lead_paragraph: Technological advances are helping refine tools for hearing in less-than-ideal circumstances.
